title: A Novel Approach to Asynchronous Task Parallelism
summary: This paper introduces a graph-based model for managing dependencies in highly parallel asynchronous systems, reducing overhead and improving resource utilization compared to traditional promise-based or async/await models.

title: Verifiable Computation for Decentralized Systems
publication: Proceedings of the Symposium on System Security
summary: We propose a new cryptographic primitive that allows for efficient verification of complex computations in a trustless environment, with applications in blockchain and confidential computing.
